title: Using the Teacher Skills Report to drive differentiation on Khan Academy

media:group.media:title: Using the Teacher Skills Report to drive differentiation on Khan Academy
media:group.media:description:
This video will show you how to access and analyze the Skills Report in the teacher dashboard, and provides tips on using this data to drive differentiation.

For more information on how to use Teacher Skills Reports to supercharge your classroom, visit: https://www.khanacademy.org/khan-for-educators/k4e-us-demo/xb78db74671c953a7:using-cou[â€¦]ogress-towards-mastery/a/using-khan-academy-s-skills-report
